org.opends.sdk.responses
Interface SearchResultReference

All Superinterfaces:
Response
public interface SearchResultReference
extends Response

A Search Result Reference represents an area not yet explored during a Search operation.

Method Summary
 SearchResultReference addControl(Control control)
          Adds the provided control to this response.
 SearchResultReference addURI(String uri)
          Adds the provided continuation reference URI to this search result reference.
 SearchResultReference clearControls()
          Removes all the controls included with this response.
 SearchResultReference clearURIs()
          Removes all the continuation reference URIs included with this search result reference.
 Control getControl(String oid)
          Returns the first control contained in this response having the specified OID.
 Iterable<Control> getControls()
          Returns an Iterable containing the controls included with this response.
 int getURICount()
          Returns the number of continuation reference URIs in this search result reference.
 Iterable<String> getURIs()
          Returns an Iterable containing the continuation reference URIs included with this search result reference.
 boolean hasControls()
          Indicates whether or not this response has any controls.
 boolean hasURIs()
          Indicates whether or not this search result reference has any continuation reference URIs.
 Control removeControl(String oid)
          Removes the first control contained in this response having the specified OID.

                             throws UnsupportedOperationException,
                                    NullPointerException
Adds the provided continuation reference URI to this search result reference.

Parameters:
uri - The continuation reference URI to be added.
Returns:
This search result reference.
Throws:
UnsupportedOperationException - If this search result reference does not permit continuation reference URI to be added.
NullPointerException - If uri was null.

clearURIs

SearchResultReference clearURIs()
                                throws UnsupportedOperationException
Removes all the continuation reference URIs included with this search result reference.

Returns:
This search result reference.
Throws:
UnsupportedOperationException - If this search result reference does not permit continuation reference URIs to be removed.

getControl

Control getControl(String oid)
                   throws NullPointerException
Returns the first control contained in this response having the specified OID.

Specified by:
getControl in interface Response
Parameters:
oid - The OID of the control to be returned.
Returns:
The control, or null if the control is not included with this response.
Throws:
NullPointerException - If oid was null.

getControls

Iterable<Control> getControls()
Returns an Iterable containing the controls included with this response. The returned Iterable may be used to remove controls if permitted by this response.

Specified by:
getControls in interface Response
Returns:
An Iterable containing the controls.

getURICount

int getURICount()
Returns the number of continuation reference URIs in this search result reference.

Returns:
The number of continuation reference URIs.

getURIs

Iterable<String> getURIs()
Returns an Iterable containing the continuation reference URIs included with this search result reference. The returned Iterable may be used to remove continuation reference URIs if permitted by this search result reference.

Returns:
An Iterable containing the continuation reference URIs.

hasControls

boolean hasControls()
Indicates whether or not this response has any controls.

Specified by:
hasControls in interface Response
Returns:
true if this response has any controls, otherwise false.

hasURIs

boolean hasURIs()
Indicates whether or not this search result reference has any continuation reference URIs.

Returns:
true if this search result reference has any continuation reference URIs, otherwise false.

removeControl

Control removeControl(String oid)
                      throws UnsupportedOperationException,
                             NullPointerException
Removes the first control contained in this response having the specified OID.

Specified by:
removeControl in interface Response
Parameters:
oid - The OID of the control to be removed.
Returns:
The removed control, or null if the control is not included with this response.
Throws:
UnsupportedOperationException - If this response does not permit controls to be removed.
NullPointerException - If oid was null.
